attributes.action:
Petition against the "Petition" Donald J Trump "American president"
State visit
attributes.additional_details:
Simply anti- Trump campaigners and re-moaners letting off more steam as they struggle to come to terms with losing 2 times in the same year. 
PETITION THE PETITION....
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister first announced last week, during her visit to Washington, that Mr Trump had accepted an invitation from the Queen to visit the UK later this year.
A petition has started against his visit.
This petition is against that petition. 
THIS IS A YES VOTE FOR TRUMP.....
